messages.title: £8 billion more for our NHS
messages.content: Protecting spending on nurses, schools and colleges.

messages.title: A fair start for every child
messages.content: The Lib Dems have committed to protecting funding for schools, nurseries and colleges, in the next Parliament.

messages.title: A record rise in jobs and apprenticeships
messages.content: Creating more jobs and apprenticeships and supporting businesses.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The plan includes £8 billion a year extra for the NHS, reversing the services' reach crisis point.
Committed to protecting funding for schools, nurseries and colleges, with a qualified teacher in every classroom.
£800 Income Tax cut for ordinary local workers, getting the economy on track.
1.9 million new jobs and apprenticeships, supporting businesses to create more private sector jobs.

mentions.candidate: Greg Mulholland has been a prominent voice in the campaign to review the Safe and Sustainable decision to stop children's heart surgery in Leeds - Leeds Children's Heart Unit.

issues.economy: Fixing the economy - and creating more jobs and apprenticeships.
issues.education: A fair start for every child - The Lib Dems have committed to protecting funding for schools, nurseries and colleges.
issues.governance: Your choice in Leeds North West - Lib Dems say 'NO' to Conservative plan to pay less if they get outvoted somehow.
issues.health: £8 billion a year extra for the NHS - The Lib Dems are planning to increase spending on the NHS.

housing.content: Fighting Leeds North West for development of Green Belt

politicalExperience.role: MP for our area for 10 years
politicalExperience.achievements: Campaigning for better pay for our armed forces, Leeds and opposing NGT.

quotes.text: I used to vote Labour but never again!
quotes.source: Real life stories from Leeds North West
